Horizontal-Vertical segments: Start with click on tail port
Oblique link: Start with ctrl+click on tail port
Hybrid link: Start with click on tail port

Horizontal-Vertical segments: End with click on head port
Oblique link: End with click on head port
Hybrid link: End with ctrl+click on head port

Horizontal-Vertical segments: Handle on segment to deplace it
Oblique link: Handle on segment to split it
Handle on vertex to deplace it
